conclusion: Violation of Art. 5-3;No violation of Art. 5-4;Violation of Art. 5-5;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;Violation of Art. 6-1;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
